summary: Somewhere in Central America in 1907: Maria II is the daughter of an Irish terrorist. After her father's death, she meets Maria I, a singer in a circus. She decides to stay with the circus,... See full summary »
cast: Brigitte Bardot|Jeanne Moreau|George Hamilton|Paulette Dubost|Gregor von Rezzori|Poldo Bendandi|Claudio Brook|Carlos López Moctezuma|Jonathan Eden|Francisco Reiguera|Adriana Roel|José Baviera|José Ángel Espinosa 'Ferrusquilla'|Fernando Wagner|Roberto Pedret|Luis Rizo|Ramón Bugarini|José Luis Campa|Roberto Campa|José Esqueda|Eduardo Murillo|Carlos Riquelme
title: ¡Viva María!
